Articles.Content: No, eat Beets!
no, eat PotatOS!
No, eat hydrogen bombs.
No, eat ununquadium!
no, eat ferminium
no, eat antimater
We eat antimatter!
I eat antimatter!
You're dead.
You're an enslaved undead zombie.
You're eaten by an enslaved undead zombie
You've eaten an enslaved, undead zombie.
You've eaten a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead zobie
You've eaten a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then it starts raining
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then it starts raining demons
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then it starts raining men.
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then it starts raining psychotic Twilight
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then you are forced to watch Twilight.
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then you are forced to eat all Twilight books.
You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then you are forced to watch and eat all Twilight movies

You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then you are forced to watch all of the Twilight movies

(Frankly, this is worse than watching and eating them, because at least when you eat them you are destroying them. Which is good, because twilight deserves to be erased from existence completely.)

You're eaten by a left for dead 2 disk while eating an enslaved, undead black hole. And then you are forced to watch all of the Twilight movies with director commentary

(the last 4 posts are dangerously close together ^^ I almost got lost there for a minute. We need a little more differentiation between the next ones ^^)

(also, does anyone else find Kirsten Stewart incredibly depressing? she has an expression range of Liam Neeson..)
Your eaten by Kirsten Stewart....'-'
